text: Abasya ami iccha karale tara maryada bariye ditama se sakala nidarsanasamuhera daulate. Kintu se ye adhahpatita ebam nijera ripura anugami haye ra'ila. Sutaram tara abastha hala kukurera mata; yadi take tara kara tabu'o hampabe ara yadi chere da'o tabu'o hampabe. E hala sesaba lokera udaharana; yara mithya pratipanna kareche amara nidarsanasamuhake. Ata'eba, apani bibrta karuna esaba kahini, yate tara cinta kare.
